analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/34/0x23e861600521cd58b2120602a4c55d1243135afb.sol:
	Contract EPay has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/34/0x23e861600521cd58b2120602a4c55d1243135afb.sol#205-206)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/34/0x23e861600521cd58b2120602a4c55d1243135afb.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/34/0x23e861600521cd58b2120602a4c55d1243135afb.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/34/0x23e861600521cd58b2120602a4c55d1243135afb.sol#75-76) is not in mixedCase
